column4: Room: I have recently reformatted a winXP laptop to run Intrepid, and am having minor Graphical glitches (for one example, when I open a new firefox window, I get a brief second of static within the window, before everything is fine) but now when I try installing programs with wine (Sims 2) my screen goes all sorts of wonky, and freezes. Talked to the guys over at #winehq, and they say it's a video card problem. Do I need a driver/deb p
Disable your special effects and try again. Let us know if that is what is causing it.
I and using AWN, so I have to keep the special effects.
